codeSystems.name: NGGenderVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Gender or Sex VS
codeSystems.description: Subset of HL7 administrative-gender limited to 'male' and 'female'.

codeSystems.name: NGLanguagesVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Languages VS
codeSystems.description: The Patient's preferred language for communication.

codeSystems.name: NGLGAsVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm LGAs VS
codeSystems.description: The administrative Local Government Areas where a person or a facility is.

codeSystems.name: NGOrganizationOwnerVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Location Owner
codeSystems.description: The owner of an Immunization location

codeSystems.name: NGRelationshipsVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Relationships VS
codeSystems.description: list of persons related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care.

codeSystems.name: NGSessionTypeVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Session Type VS
codeSystems.description: Type of session for immunization. Could be in a fixed facility, outreach or mobile.

codeSystems.name: NGSiblingHealthStatusVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Sibling Health Status VS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines the health of the client's sibling

codeSystems.name: NGStatesVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm States VS
codeSystems.description: The state where a person or a facility is.

codeSystems.name: NGContraindicationVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Vaccine Contraindication VS
codeSystems.description: A set of standardized codes used to represent clinical conditions, diagnoses, or circumstances that serve as contraindications to the administration of one or more vaccines.

codeSystems.name: NGVaccineLibraryVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm VaccineLibrary VS
codeSystems.description: A curated list of vaccines recognized under Nigeria's national immunization program

codeSystems.name: NGWardsVS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Wards VS
codeSystems.description: The administrative Ward (within an LGA) where a person or a facility is.
